alert.note: Alert for Centre; Juniata; Mifflin; Snyder; Union (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 04 at 3:16PM EDT until August 04 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Centre County in central Pennsylvania... North central Juniata County in central Pennsylvania... Northeastern Mifflin County in central Pennsylvania... Western Snyder County in central Pennsylvania... Southwestern Union County in central Pennsylvania... * Until 415 PM EDT. * At 315 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Rebersburg, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Woodward, Mcalisterville, McClure, Millheim, Beaver Springs, Aaronsburg, Richfield, Rebersburg, Mount Pleasant Mills, Paxtonville, Coburn and Troxelville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Stay inside a well built structure and keep away from windows.
